com.mousebird.maply

Class SunUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.SunUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveObject

    public class SunUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActiveObject
    This is used internally to update the sun position for an atmospheric shader. It shouldn't be used directly.
